sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-form
    :model="formModel"
    :layout="formLayout"
    :validate-status="validateStatus"
    :rules="rules"
    ref="formRef"
  >
    <a-form-item label="Form variant" name="variant">
      <a-select v-model="formModel.variant">
        <a-select-option value="outlined">Outlined</a-select-option>
        <a-select-option value="filled">Filled</a-select-option>
        <a-select-option value="borderless">Borderless</a-select-option>
      </a-select>
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="Input" name="input" :rules="rules.input">
      <a-input v-model="formModel.input" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item
      label="InputNumber"
      name="inputNumber"
      :rules="rules.inputNumber"
    >
      <a-input-number v-model="formModel.inputNumber" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="TextArea" name="textArea" :rules="rules.textArea">
      <a-input v-model="formModel.textArea" type="textarea" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="Mentions" name="mentions" :rules="rules.mentions">
      <!-- Ant Design Vue does not have a Mentions component -->
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="Select" name="select" :rules="rules.select">
      <a-select v-model="formModel.select">
        <!-- Add options here -->
      </a-select>
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="Cascader" name="cascader" :rules="rules.cascader">
      <a-cascader v-model="formModel.cascader" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="TreeSelect" name="treeSelect" :rules="rules.treeSelect">
      <a-tree-select v-model="formModel.treeSelect" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item label="DatePicker" name="datePicker" :rules="rules.datePicker">
      <a-date-picker v-model="formModel.datePicker" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item
      label="RangePicker"
      name="rangePicker"
      :rules="rules.rangePicker"
    >
      <a-range-picker v-model="formModel.rangePicker" />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item>
      <a-button type="primary" @click="handleSubmit">Submit</a-button>
    </a-form-item>
  </a-form>
</template>

<script>
import { FormRules } from "ant-design-vue";
import { ref } from "vue";

export default {
  setup() {
    const formModel = ref({
      variant: "filled",
      input: "",
      inputNumber: null,
      textArea: "",
      select: null,
      cascader: [],
      treeSelect: null,
      datePicker: null,
      rangePicker: [],
    });

    const formRef = ref(null);

    const rules = FormRules({
      input: [{ required: true, message: "Please input!" }],
      inputNumber: [{ required: true, message: "Please input!" }],
      textArea: [{ required: true, message: "Please input!" }],
      select: [{ required: true, message: "Please select!" }],
      cascader: [{ required: true, message: "Please select!" }],
      treeSelect: [{ required: true, message: "Please select!" }],
      datePicker: [{ required: true, message: "Please select date!" }],
      rangePicker: [{ required: true, message: "Please select date range!" }],
    });

    const handleSubmit = () => {
      formRef.value
        .validate()
        .then(() => {
          console.log("Form validated", formModel.value);
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Form validation failed", error);
        });
    };

    return {
      formModel,
      formRef,
      rules,
      handleSubmit,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add any custom styles here */
</style>
